title: PBE Page Broken?!?!?

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body: So i've been trying to go on the PBE page for a while and when I try to go on the page it looks broken cause the bold text under the picture is in the middle of the text that explains what PBE is and when i click want to help is keeps saying error. Its been like a month or so can any one help?

replies.body:
The page works on my end. Can you try a different browser or clear your browser data using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)?

If this continues to happen, please [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and send me a link to it.

Every time I press "I wan't to help" it keeps saying "Error 500:  Somethingâ€™s gone hextechnically wrong.

Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem."  What do I do
Same thing is happening to me. Months later.

Since the browser cache clear didn't resolve this for you, it's very likely the login process is failing. Be sure you're logging in from the [NA Landing Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/) before visiting the [PBE Signup Page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

I hope that helped!
They are currently trying to fix it. Have patience.
no idea why this is happening.
